articles.author: Ayelet Sheffey
articles.title: The pain Trump said Americans will feel is already here - Business Insider
articles.description: Trump said the nation would feel some financial pain due to tariffs. We're already in the thick of it.
articles.content:
Companies have warned of rising prices. Markets have plunged. Bad vibes are back. President Donald Trump's tariff plans might not be in full force yet but Americans are feeling the strain.
Ahead of … [+4741 chars]
